text:
Anushka Sharma Trolls Fans In Singapore, Poses As Her Own Wax Statue & Leaves Them Startled!
Anushka Sharma Trolls Fans In Singapore, Poses As Her Own Wax Statue & Leaves Them Startled!
Anushka Sharma is an elegant lady for sure, but some part of her is goofy, fun and mischievous as well. She has an infectious energy and a charismatic persona that makes her even more adorable, don’t you agree?
Did you know, she is also a great prankster? Anushka Sharma is the first Indian celebrity who has an interactive wax statue at Madame Tussauds. For the uninitiated, interactive wax statue can move its arms and can also talk.
Her statue was unveiled on Nov 20 in Singapore. And the lady decided to have a little fun with her fans who came to click selfies with the statue.
So, Anushka posed like a statue waiting to troll her fans. As soon as they came near her, she would scream and move, and so scare them off. Take a look!
Anushka Sharma is a prankster too, now you know?
Don't Miss 3.5 K SHARES 174 SHARES 3.1 K SHARES

Her statue was unveiled on Nov 20 in Singapore. And the lady decided to have a little fun with her fans who came to click selfies with the statue.
